name: firebase-ci-builder
shortDescription:
Docker image for projects needing to run Firebase CLI, npm and Firebase emulation (which requires Java).

This enables you to:
- run Firebase Emulators in Cloud Build (CI)
- develop using Docker / Docker Compose running the emulators
longDescription:
Docker image for projects needing to run Firebase CLI, npm and Firebase emulation (which requires Java).

This enables you to:
- run Firebase Emulators in Cloud Build (CI)
- develop using Docker / Docker Compose running the emulators
